HDG.FS.content: Greek philosophers, more Greek than Greek, asked question of being but not question of alētheia as such > question concerning being as being never been posed (gestellt)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Greek philosophers, more Greek than Greek, asked question of being but not question of alētheia as such > question concerning being as being never been posed (gestellt)

HDG.TC.content: philosophers don’t just tread in place, they go backwards > not every answer is an answer to a question, if the essence of man is the answer, the question of its essence was never raised?
